channel.title: .50 Cal Turret (which is NOT a Submachine Gun)
channel.description: Hi, I have a suggestion about a stationary machine gun. In my opinion it is better to do the same as in l4d. This will make the animation holding gun as 1 person and 3. It may also disappear bug with constant rotating machine gun aside.

item.title: .50 Cal Turret (which is NOT a Submachine Gun)
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
LordDz:

Should be doable in hammer with say a point_viewcontrol?

You’d still need to move the player’s hitbox and model, especially for multiplayer.

Read full topic
item.source: .50 Cal Turret (which is NOT a Submachine Gun)

item.title: .50 Cal Turret (which is NOT a Submachine Gun)
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

We considered doing L4D style turrets at one point. Their implementation is indeed superior to the Half-Life one, in our opinion. But, we deemed it to be too much trouble and work for a relatively minor mechanic. We may look at it at some point in the future though.

I renamed the thread title by the way. As much as your choice of title amused me, it was also triggering me.

Was…
Was that a pun?

For shame, Text. For shame!

Read full topic
item.source: .50 Cal Turret (which is NOT a Submachine Gun)
